class.name: EditorSelection
class.brief_description: Manages the SceneTree selection in the editor.
class.description: This object manages the SceneTree selection in the editor. [b]Note:[/b] This class shouldn't be instantiated directly. Instead, access the singleton using [method EditorInterface.get_selection].

method.name: add_node
method.description: Adds a node to the selection. [b]Note:[/b] The newly selected node will not be automatically edited in the inspector. If you want to edit a node, use [method EditorInterface.edit_node].

method.name: get_selected_nodes
method.description: Returns the list of selected nodes.

method.name: get_transformable_selected_nodes
method.description: Returns the list of selected nodes, optimized for transform operations (i.e. moving them, rotating, etc.). This list can be used to avoid situations where a node is selected and is also a child/grandchild.

method.name: remove_node
method.description: Removes a node from the selection.
